text:
─Cinnamon apple soda,
lemon ginger, shortcake shake...

They all look delicious, it's hard to decide
If I had to choose... maybe a warm drink?

For warm options...
hot lemonade, hot chocolate...

And, Vancho...?
I wonder what that is?

Oh... it's hot wine
Perfect for cold weather.

Oh... then maybe this is good for you, Natsuha
You want to warm up, right?

But, today, I want to enjoy together!
It's Christmas after all...!

What about you, Juri?
As for me...─
